A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm surprised by all the negative comments this film has received. I loved it. Sure\, I understand why some people were so disappointed by this film\, but it was a fun\, shocking film that was worth the watch. The Canto Bight scene was boring\, but once it was past that\, the film got back on track. It's not the best film in the franchise\, but it's definitely up there.
